headline: Coinbase demands SEC accountability after lost Gary Gensler’s text messages episode
summary: Coinbase filed a federal court motion demanding accountability after the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) deleted nearly a year of text messages from former Chair Gary Gensler during the agency’s crypto enforcement campaign. The Sept. 11 filing seeks expedited discovery, sanctions, and immediate production of all responsive communications. An SEC Office of Inspector General report […] The post Coinbase demands SEC accountability after lost Gary Gensler’s text messages episode appeared fi

headline: Thousands Sign Crypto Petition: Is Coinbase Starting a Crypto Revolution in UK?

headline: Taoshi taps Bittensor to bring $7.5tn forex market to DeFi with new exchange
